DOC.brief_summary: Sorend is a water-based formula, which contains carob, melissa and sage. Elder inhabitants of Israel are known to use carob extract to ease sores in the mouth, due to the tannins which create a complex with various proteins and polysaccharides, thus creating an impenetrable layer covering the sores, allowing spontaneous healing.
